cause.description:
A cause to benefit the good work of Schooner, Inc. A Connecticut based 501(c) (3) organization dedicated to raising awareness of the environment and history of Long Island Sound.
1. Protect Long Island Sound.
cause.mission: promote environmental awareness and personal growth by providing educational experiences in marine science, sailing and the history of Long Island Sound and its watershed.
cause.name: Schooner, Inc.
